remarks: Right operation by a constant.  (Contributed by NM, 7-Oct-2014.)
statement:
ofc2.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
ofc2.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. W ) $.
ofc2.3 $e |- ( ph -> F Fn A ) $.
ofc2.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ X e. A ) -> ( F ` X ) = C ) $.
ofc2 $p |- ( ( ph /\ X e. A ) -> ( ( F oF R ( A X. { B } ) ) ` X ) = ( C R B ) ) $.
